== Venginissery (CT) (627856) ==

Venginissery (CT) is a town in the [[Thrissur]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 2.97 sq. km. and harbouring 1349 households with total population of 5533 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Thrissur]] is at a distance of 10 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 297 km. Male population is 2656 and female population is 2877. Scheduled Caste population is 609 and Scheduled Tribes population is 13. Census Location Code of the town is 627856<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class V (population_total 5,000 to 9,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Thrissur (m corp.) at a distance of 10 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 78 km. Railway station is at Thrissur at a distance of 10 km.
